stanimir_nikolov.title: StanimirNikolov.com
description: My portfolio website. It has my projects, CV and contact details. Built in React and Tailwind CSS.
technical_details: The website uses React with React Router.
Adobe PDF Embed API shows the PDF CV file.

zeolite.title: Zeolite.bg
description: Marketing website for a zelite distributer. Interactive with a multi-language support.
technical_details: The interactivity and appearance are added using Bootstrap and JavaScript and CSS.
The language preferences are saved in Local Storage.
The translation is fetched as JSON and applied on the page.

psytest.title: Psychology Test
description: Web Application running a psychological test for a research project. It collects data, sends it to the server and saves it in an SQL file.
technical_details: The Web App is built in React, while the server is NodeJS with Express.
Session Storage and IndexDB API's are used to save the test data (photos, progress, results, page access etc.)
The main test an asynchronous function which awaits participant's input and saves it.
The final results are sent as JSON to the server and converted to SQL using Sequelize.

esudance.title: EsuDance
description: Dance company website with photo/video gallery, timetable and contact details. Built in plain HTML, CSS and JavaScript (no libraries or frameworks).
technical_details: The gallery uses low resolution photos in page mode and fetches high resolution photos in fullscreen mode.
The classes page is a single-page application. It populates the content from a JSON file and changes content in response to hash changes.

candle_label_generator.title: Label Generator for Candles
description: My first JavaScript project. A small web app used to create labels for candles
technical_details: Built in plain HTML, CSS and JavaScript (no libraries or frameworks).
